page.title: 14Transport in Appleby
page.content: Robinson's is the only bus company in Appleby.It has about 2 buses and nine coaches.They do school bus runs for Appleby Grammar School and Appleby Primary School and round the town. They sometimes go abroad to Switzerland,France and other places.They sometimes go to Blackpool and other places all over England doing special holiday tours.There is a bus to Penrith on Tuesdays.My Grandad John Lance Elliott owns the company and my dad Philip Robinson Elliott drives the buses with other drivers. We have a special railway station at Appleby because it is on the Carlisle to Settle railway line which is danger of being closed down. Sometimes steam trains run on our line and then Appleby Station is very busy. Mark Elliott
